channel.title: Josh Strife Plays
channel.description:
Welcome, I'm Josh Strife Hayes, I critique and analyse videogames.
This channel is all about playing those games we all love and asking, were they really that good?
channel.itunes:author: Josh Strife Plays
channel.itunes:subtitle: Josh Strife Plays
channel.itunes:summary:
Welcome, I'm Josh Strife Hayes, I critique and analyse videogames.
This channel is all about playing those games we all love and asking, were they really that good?

item.title: Was it Good? - Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2
item.description:
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/joshstrifehayes Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/joshstrifehayes Discord: https://discord.gg/GM2sCUX Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/joshstrifehayes
#####
Buy the game: https://www.gog.com/en/game/legacy_of_kain_soul_reaver_12_remastered
#####
Flip a coin enough time, suppose one day, it lands on its edge...
Soul Reaver 2 is the incredible story of Raziel and Kian's blossoming bromance as they fight against time itself...
but was it actually any good to play?
Thanks to the supporters on Patreon and Twitch who keep this channel alive.
